settings.style: epic sci-fi realism, emotional atmosphere, cinematic clarity

prompts.text: A quiet city at dawn, bathed in soft golden light from the Anari. The group prepares for the final day. Shadows stretch across rooftops.
Sarah, Aida, Martinez, and Daryl stand around a 3D projection of Earth showing attack vectors, countdowns, and energy zones.
People across different countries activate makeshift command centers. Screens glow, diverse leaders coordinate via video link.
Dark alien ships break through the clouds, massive and ominous. A deep, echoing hum vibrates through the city.
Humans and Anari deploy glowing shield barriers and floating defense drones. The sky is tense with anticipation.
Father Martinez leads a multi-faith group in prayer under open sky. Some kneel, others hold hands. A moment of peace before battle.
Daryl speaks into a headset calmly, eyes determined. Red warning lights blink around him as the room vibrates with tension.
Explosions light the sky as the first wave of Vakâ€™tar strikes. Humans, Anari, and drones fight together in chaotic urban warfare.
Inside a virtual space, Aida navigates massive data flows with glowing hands. Her eyes are lit with streaming symbols.
A great golden light spreads across the sky. The battlefield slows, people look up. A sense of ending and transformation fills the air.
